column1: Engage - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Make it so. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Tea. Earl Grey. Hot. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Seize the time, Meribor. Live now; make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again. - Picard/Kamin
Our neural pathways have become accustomed to your sensory input patterns. - William T. Riker
With the first link, the chain is forged. The first speech censored, the first thought forbidden, the first freedom denied, chains us all irrevocably. - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
If there's nothing wrong with me... maybe there's something wrong with the universe! - Dr. Beverly Crusher
There are four lights! - Captain Jean-Luc Picard
Die with honour - Tosk
Laws change depending on who's making them, but justice is justice. - Odo
Ston
column2: she is yours. You may find that having is not so pleasing a thing as wanting. This is not logical

column1: Once you have their money, you never give it back. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #1
Never spend more for an acquisition than you have to. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #3
Never allow family to stand in the way of profit. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #6
Keep your ears open. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #7
Opportunity plus instinct equals profit. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #9
Greed is eternal. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #10
A deal is a deal. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #16
A contract is a contract is a contract (but only between Ferengi). - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #17
A Ferengi without profit is no Ferengi at all. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #18
Never place friendship above profit. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #21
A wise man can hear profit in the wind. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #22
Nothing is more important than your health ... except for your money. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #23
Never make fun of a Ferengi's mother. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #31
It never hurts to suck up to the boss. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #33
War is good for business. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #34
Peace is good for business. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #35
Expand or die. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #45
Don't trust a man wearing a better suit than your own. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #47
The bigger the smile, the sharper the knife. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #48
Good customers are as rare as latinum; treasure them. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #57
Free advice is seldom cheap. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #59
The riskier the road, the greater the profit. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #62
Knowledge equals profit. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #74
Home is where the heart is, but the stars are made of latinum. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #75
Every once in a while, declare peace. It confuses the hell out of your enemies. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #76
Females and finances don't mix. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #94
Expand or die. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #95
Every man has his price. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #98
Nature decays, but latinum lasts forever. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #102
Dignity and an empty sack is worth the sack. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #109
Treat people in your debt like family: exploit them. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #111
Never have sex with the boss's sister. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #112
You can't make a deal if you're dead. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #125
Wives serve, brothers inherit. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #139
Whisper your way to success. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #168
Hear all, trust nothing. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #190
It's always good business to know about new customers before they walk in your door. - Ferengi RofA #194
New customers are like razor-toothed gree worms; they can be succulent, but sometimes they bite back. - Ferengi RofA #203
Sometimes the only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #208
Employees are the rungs on the ladder of success. Don't hesitate to step on them. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #211
Never begin a business negotiation on an empty stomach. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #214
You can't free a fish from water. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #217
Latinum lasts longer than lust. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #229
Never be afraid to mislabel a product. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #239
Never allow doubt to tarnish your lust for latinum. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #263
No good deed ever goes unpunished. - Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #285
Computers make excellent and efficient servants, but I have no wish to serve under them. - Spock
Insufficient facts always invite danger. - Spock
In critical moments, men sometimes see exactly what they wish to see. - Spock
After a time, you may find that having is not so pleasing a thing after all as wanting. - Spock
Without followers, evil cannot spread. - Spock
When you eliminate the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth. - Spock
Live long and prosper. - Spock
The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few. - Spock
